Problem is that we the limited set is synchronized, so single method calls are safe, but streaming on it isn't
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/33190500/does-collections-synchronized-map-makes-iterator-threadsafe

seems like something to consider in various places..

Just discovered that we already have the iterable version of `LimitedMap`, backed by Guava cache which is thread safe.
Checked the eventual wrong usage of the synchronized version and seems like we are all good.
